description: Allows the mob to look at nearby entities.
title: Behavior.look_at_entity 1.8.0

look_distance.description: The distance in blocks from which the entity will look at
look_distance.title: Look Distance

probability.description: The probability of looking at the target. A value of 1.00 is 100%
probability.title: Probability

look_time.description: Time range to look at the entity
look_time.title: Look Time

angle_of_view_vertical.description: The angle in degrees that the mob can see in the X-axis (left-right)
angle_of_view_vertical.title: Angle Of View Vertical

angle_of_view_horizontal.description: The angle in degrees that the mob can see in the Y-axis (up-down)
angle_of_view_horizontal.title: Angle Of View Horizontal

filters.description: Filter to determine the conditions for this mob to look at the entity
filters.title: Filters
